game.name: Sisters Cakes Battle
game.description:
These two beautiful sisters have got participated in a major cooking contest. These princesses look very excited since this is the first time when they are going to compete with each other. Being princesses, they generally keep away from the kitchen so they do not know how to handle this situation. Would you come forward and guide them to prepare a mouth-watering cake recipe? Join Sisters Cakes Battle and be prepared to create the best cake you have ever made and make your favorite princess win!

The problem is that you have to help them from the scratch. They do not have any knowledge of where to begin and end. Use all the ingredients that you see on the bottom portion of the screen to cook your cake and then decorate them with some colorful icing and other decorative items in this HTML5 cooking game. Put your cooking and decoration abilities to the test to create an awesome result in the end! Your impressive cooking abilities have encouraged these sisters to hire you as their personal chef.

Find all the items right from the cake base to tasty whipped cream and other necessary items in different colors and designs on the on-screen and get ready to bake cake together in this cool food game! You would spot a judge chef sitting in the middle of both the cute princesses. Once you are done, click the next button and the judge will give the trophy to the one whose cake looks best. Good luck to have a wonderful time with Anna and Elsa! Try out other popular titles from the category of free girls games that feature other renowned Disney princesses!
